Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel des Puys, you'll be centrally located in Clermont-Ferrand, steps from Notre Dame du Port and minutes from Blaise Pascal University. This hotel is within close proximity of Clermont-Ferrand Cathedral and Musee du Ranquet.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 63 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars (stocked with some free items) and espresso makers. 32-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Clermont-Ferrand? This hotel has facilities measuring 538 square feet (50 square meters), including meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.
